DOC.brief_summary: This open label , dose-finding , 2-parts study . Approximately 6 subject participate study . This study compose 2 part : Part 1 dose find study . Part 2 pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic study elect dose . A screening use determine patient ' suitability inclusion trial . Within one week screen visit , subject meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion enter part 1 study , one day dose escalation . During part , patient undergo rectal manometry determine anal pressure baseline . Afterwards coat suppository various drug concentration insert follow manometries perform determine response . Patients presented increase rectal rest pressure without adverse event enter second part study . In part , patient administer coated suppository , dose find part 1 study cause significant anal contraction . Manometry study perform insertion ( baseline ) 1 , 3 5 hour insertion . Blood level drug concentration take times 0 , 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 , 300 minute administration rectal manometries do time 0 , 1 , 3 5 hour administration .
DOC.brief_title: An Study Examine Effect Coated Suppositories Anal Pressure Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent . Male female subject 18 55 year age ; Known allergy active drug excipients . Pregnancy lactation . Active cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease include unstable angina , myocardial infarction , transient ischemic attacks/stroke , clinically significant arrhythmia , congestive heart failure , cardiac valve abnormality ; Type 1 diabetes mellitus ; Insulin treat type 2 diabetes mellitus ; Renal insufficiency . Liver insufficiency . Malignant disease within 5 year screen ; History rectal surgery . History HIV , hepatitis B , hepatitis C. Has upon physical examination rectal deformation sign rectal disease fissure , bleed hemorrhoid , fistula , infection space occupy lesion . Chronic use medication exception birth control pill .
